text: Maricourt is a municipality in Le Val-Saint-François Regional County Municipality in the Estrie region of Quebec.MAMROT - Maricourt The population was 497 in the Canada 2011 Census. ==Demographics== ===Population=== ===Language=== Mother tongue (2011) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Language ! Population ! title: Maricourt, Quebec
